description: Learned production engineering fundamentals including infrastructure as code, monitoring, and incident response.
Gained hands-on experience with CI/CD pipelines, logging, alerting, and performance optimization.
Collaborated with mentors and teams to troubleshoot live production issues and improve system reliability.
Developed features for Google Search infrastructure improving latency and reliability.
Implemented scalable microservices in Go and optimized data pipelines using BigQuery.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams following Agile practices to ship new product enhancements.
Built interactive UI components for Facebookâ€™s mobile web app using React and TypeScript.
Improved app performance by reducing bundle size and optimizing rendering.
Worked closely with design and product teams to enhance user experience and accessibility.
Monitored and maintained AWS cloud infrastructure supporting high-traffic e-commerce systems.
Automated deployment workflows using AWS Lambda and CloudFormation.
Participated in incident management and root cause analysis to improve system uptime.
